list_definition.definition: sad because of being in love

list_ex_of_english: Sure enough, the lovesick lump of loam cuts in on his rubbery rival for the fair damsel's affections.
She is a young student in literature who is lovesick.
Often lovesick, most of his relationships haven't worked out.
Lovesick was released as the album's second single.
Edwards might gain a lot more sympathy for his lovesick plight if his character didn't come off as such a thick-witted wimp.
